
# Getting started

To install the extension use the command:

```bash
quarto use template zhaw-lsfm/quarto-thesis
```

This will install the format extension and create an example qmd file that you can use as a starting place for your document. If you are new to quarto:  We've prepared a guide to getting started with Quarto, Typst and this template here: 

<https://zhaw-adls.github.io/PA2-Quarto-Typst>
